title: Store photos in complete privacy
subtitle: All your photos in one secure place that's completely private.
subtitle2: Not us, or any third-party can ever access your photos.
subtitle3: Want to get early access and product updates?

title: One plan for all our services.
subtitle: Get more out of Internxt with our all in one membership that allows you to use one storage plan across all our services.

title: Designed to keep your photos secure.
subtitle: What you store on Internxt Photos is protected with end-to-end encryption
subtitle2: Machines only hold encrypted shards, never whole files. Our machines are distributed around the world, never in one place.

title: Share files with complete control.
subtitle: Secure, private and easy file sharing with our end-to-end encrypted links.
subtitle2: Files get encrypted before they leave your device and only get decrypted until accessed by your recipient.
